component.name: showStatus
component.description: Returns a single Tweet, specified by the id parameter. The Tweet's author will also be embedded within the tweet.

component.name: updateStatus
component.description: Updates the authenticating user's current status, also known as tweeting. To upload an image to accompany the tweet, use POST statuses/update_with_media.

component.name: retweet
component.description: Retweets a tweet. Returns the original tweet with retweet details embedded.

component.name: destroyStatus
component.description: Destroys the status specified by the required ID parameter. The authenticating user must be the author of the specified status. Returns the destroyed status if successful.
